text: Bruce Robert Allpress (25 August 1930 â€“ 23 April 2020) was a New Zealand actor. He appeared in many television dramas and also presented on television and radio productions. In the mid-1980s, he was a regular on The Billy T. James Show, as well as featuring alongside Tommy Lee Jones in the pirate adventure movie Nate and Hayes. He was best known for his role as Aldor in the movie The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers. Allpress died on 23 April 2020, aged 89, in Auckland six months after being diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:New Zealand television actors
